title.rendered: NC’s Crypto Investment Bill Advances, Bringing Digital Assets Closer to Public Portfolios

content.rendered: North Carolina is set to modernize its investment strategy with a bill allowing the State Treasurer to allocate funds to digital asset products, signaling a shift toward blockchain-based finance. North Carolina Considers Crypto Investments for State Funds in New Bill North Carolina Speaker of the House Destin Hall and Representatives Stephen Ross, Mark Brody, and […]
